ygData.subject: Re: Bugging & Petitioning
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe.  Well considering I bugged this almost a year ago in Beta 4 (or was it 3?), it takes a while for them to fix things. Rex ... From: Brangwen
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe. Well considering I bugged this almost a year ago in Beta 4 (or was it
3?), it takes a while for them to fix things.

Rex

----- Original Message -----
From: "Brangwen" <brangwen@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, December 05, 1999 10:05 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bugging & Petitioning


> From: "Brangwen" <brangwen@...>
>
> Been hunting in Unrest the last few nites.... my first time there. Died
> several times the first nite, due to poor groups - my enchanter husband
kept
> telling people which thing to kill (he was mezzing the others), but they
> didn't follow his direction - but later we got a great group going in the
BK
> room, and some higher level friends of ours got a group going in the
Knight
> room upstairs and were handy to help in case we got in trouble... And,
until
> almost the entire server crashed, we were doing great and having much fun!
>
> Anyway, I don't know if it's the same on all servers, but on The Rathe,
the
> skeletons do not have a nametag like all the other NPCs. I petitioned this
> (first time I ever petitioned anything), because at one point we were
trying
> to fight three or four different skeles, and it was hard to get targeted
the
> correct one to fight (and some were having a hard time figuring out how to
> use the assist command...) - but I digress... I basically petitioned that
> the skeles get nametags so they would be easier to target and identify,
and
> an assistant got right back to me (I was impressed) and said he understood
> my point and was going to request they fix that.
>
> Now... I was wondering if any of you have gotten such quick response and
if
> anyone has ever seen them fix things like that... or if it takes them a
> while to fix things like that... Just curious what kind of responses
people
> have gotten, etc.
>
> Safe journeys all!
>
> ==Lady Brangwen Incantare of the 22nd Song
> ====The Lavender-Eyed Lady of Song
> ======Squire Court of The Guild New Outriders
> ========Citizen of the City of Kelethin on Faydwer
> =========Wife of High Elf Enchanter, Callais Incantare
> ===========Server: The Rathe
> ===============================================
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
